product_name: Moving Comfort Urban Gym Full-Zip Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With the look and feel of your favorite cotton hoodie, the Moving Comfort Urban Gym Full-Zip top is designed to keep you comfortable during workouts. Polyester fabric offers moisture-wicking, quick-drying comfort before, during and after workouts. High collar design with hood features an adjustable drawstring to help dial in the fit. Cuffs feature thumbholes to help keep sleeves in place and warm hands. The semifitted Moving Comfort Urban Gym Full-Zip top moves with you during activity without binding. Zippered pockets shelter hands; UPF 50+; set-in sleeves. Closeout.
short_description: With the look and feel of your favorite cotton hoodie, the Moving Comfort Urban Gym Full-Zip top is designed to keep you comfortable during workouts.
